title: Cosmic RMS
description: A comprehensive trading platform enabling management of Net Positions, Market Watch, Order Logs, and trading strategies.
companyNote: Built for internal company use - proprietary trading system with restricted access

content.title: Overview
descriptions: Developed a real-time Risk Management System for trading activities.
Displayed live data like net positions, market watch, and order logs using WebSocket.
Built an interactive dashboard for easy monitoring and decision-making.

content.title: Features
descriptions: Customizable dashboards with real-time analytics.
Interactive tables and dynamic data visualizations.
Real-time graphs including time series, line charts, and heatmaps.
Dynamic PDF report generation for trading insights.
Role-based UI rendering with multiple user roles.

title: Spectra Global
description: Official corporate website for Spectra Global Ltd., a multi-asset trading platform. Offers information about Forex, Stocks, and Futures trading through MetaTrader 5 and demo account onboarding.
companyNote: Live production site representing an international trading broker.

content.title: Overview
descriptions: Developed the official marketing website for Spectra Global Ltd.
Provides insights into trading services such as Forex, Indices, Stocks, and Futures.
Allows users to register and open demo accounts via integrated APIs.

content.title: Features
descriptions: Responsive and SEO-friendly landing pages for services and company background.
Multiple sections for product highlights, awards, FAQs, and user guides.
Integration of user registration flow for demo account access.
Interactive UI built with Ant Design and React-Bootstrap components.
Optimized build using Vite for faster performance.

title: CodeThrift
description: A real-time code collaboration platform enabling seamless multi-user editing via shareable URLs.
companyNote: Live production tool for browser-based code collaboration and sharing.

content.title: Overview
descriptions: Developed a browser-based real-time code editor enabling multiple users to collaborate seamlessly.
Dynamic URLs like /filename auto-create or join documents for friction-free multi-user editing.
Optimized frontend with Next.js and Tailwind, ensuring a smooth, responsive user experience.

content.title: Features
descriptions: Real-time WebSocket sync with debounce logic for optimal server performance.
Dynamic URL routing for instant document creation and collaboration.
Interactive UI with one-click download and clipboard sharing functionality.
Backend powered by Node.js, Express, and MongoDB for persistence and socket event management.

title: MeetSpace
description: A real-time communication platform enabling browser-based video calls, voice chats, and screen sharing using WebRTC technology.
companyNote: Live production tool for seamless group meetings and collaboration.

content.title: Overview
descriptions: Browser-based video conferencing app enabling real-time voice/video calls and screen sharing using WebRTC.
Low-latency peer-to-peer communication powered by PeerJS for seamless multi-user connectivity.
Optimized frontend with React, Redux, and PWA support for a smooth, responsive experience across devices.

content.title: Features
descriptions: Multi-user video and voice calls for group meetings and collaboration.
Real-time screen sharing for presentations and teamwork.
Progressive Web App (PWA) support for installation and offline capabilities.
Fast build and deployment using Vite and SCSS for modern performance.
